title: Drawing, 1917-4-188, June 23, 1857
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on brownish gray paper
markings:
Recto: Stamped in ink at lower left: Lugt 457c
Verso: Stamped in ink at center: Lugt 457d and Lugt 457c
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with numbers at various locations, and at upper left: 2 reflected transparent green; again at lower right: red dress / 3 brown figures; and again at bottom right:  near Jorge /  June 2 [over Ma  ld].
description: Horizontal view of half of a thatched house and a group of high plants, with a seated Indian woman and a grazing donkey in front of the house.
